text: How to  add span tag in a Module??

hmmm....I am building custom modules using html/hubl, css, etc. then adding to landing/web pages using D&D, The reason being that I am a consultant and need the team to be able to maintain and change layouts easily after I am no longer there.

Do we know why D&D has slower performance? I am guessing it might have to with inserting js/styles from the modules vs. having those in a single min file?
<@ULBP4M3LK> the d&d framework includes extra css and js which are the biggest issues
